Sports fans plan for EaglesSteelers matchup

The time has finally arrived for this years biggest football game and all of State College is on the edge of its seat in anticipation PERIOD

But it isnt Penn States game against Northwestern tomorrow PERIOD

While the Nittany Lions struggle to finish their dismal season this weekend they will be playing second fiddle to a heated contest between the NFLs top two teams who just happen to reside in Pennsylvania PERIOD

The Pittsburgh Steelers host the Philadelphia Eagles at  p.m PERIOD Sunday in a battle featuring two Super Bowlhungry cities PERIOD

Brian Henderson seniorcivil and environmental engineering is planning on attending the game on behalf of his dedication to the Steelers and there is no confusion about his rooting interest PERIOD  he said PERIOD 

Henderson said he is most surprised with the consistency of Pittsburgh quarterback Ben Roethlisberger and it is because of the rookie and his arm that the Steelers are doing so well PERIOD

 Henderson said PERIOD 

If there is one person who Eagles fans are completely sick of hearing about it is Roethlisberger according to longtime fan Todd Wengert seniorfinance PERIOD  Wengert said PERIOD 

Wengert is planning on going to the Sports Caf  W PERIOD College Ave. with nine of his closest Eagles allies PERIOD

 Wengert said PERIOD 

Fans who are truly seeking out that kind of yelling and screaming atmosphere need to look no further than Beulahs  S PERIOD Garner St. where people will be able to choose their side in the matter PERIOD

General Manager Mark Greiner said he is anticipating a larger crowd than usual due to the scope of this matchup PERIOD

 Greiner said PERIOD 

Greiner said the mixed bag of fan support that is unique to State College only adds to the fun of a weekend like this PERIOD

 Greiner said PERIOD
